name: [ impeditus ]
description:
~ entangled ~
.
.
"standing on a distant solitude,
while talking to my own shadow,
like having a conversation with strangers,
engulfed by my empty conception...

I remember yesterday as tomorrow,
I remember despair as hope,
trapped by silent and solitary existence,
as I lost myself on unknown stillness of mind..."
-240222
.
.
Graphite and colored pencils on paper.
2400 x 2400 pixel
.
.
.
Note:
There's always a limit to everything, including my own happiness.
Most of the time, after I spent some time with things I like, I would become dull and numb.
This cycle is unavoidable, at least for me.
But I do love this emotion so I can learn what I'm missing and will continue to learn.
.
.
